description: This file defines the NoteRepository class, which acts as an intermediary between the application's UI and the data access object (DAO) for notes. It provides methods for retrieving, inserting, updating, and deleting notes, utilizing LiveData for reactive data updates and an ExecutorService for background operations.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class managing note data, providing methods for data retrieval and modification while ensuring background execution for write operations.

methods.name: NoteRepository
methods.description: Constructor initializing the repository with application context, setting up the database and DAO.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Returns a LiveData stream of all notes.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches notes based on a query string.

methods.name: getNotesByCategory
methods.description: Retrieves notes filtered by category, with a special case for 'All'.
